subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Satin’s two-run, game-ending single capped a four-run outburst that gave the Mets the victory moments after Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada broke his right leg.
snippet: Josh Satin’s two-run, game-ending single capped a four-run outburst that gave the Mets the victory moments after Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada broke his right leg.
